alert.note: Alert for Eastern Will; Ford; Grundy; Iroquois; Kankakee; La Salle; Livingston; Southern Will (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Chicago (Northeastern Illinois and Northwestern Indiana)
info.headline: Flood Watch issued May 07 at 6:36PM CDT until May 08 at 12:00AM CDT by NWS Chicago
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 AM CDT/4 AM EDT/ MONDAY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is possible. * WHERE...Portions of Illinois and northwest Indiana, including the following areas, in Illinois, Eastern Will, Ford, Grundy, Iroquois, Kankakee, La Salle, Livingston and Southern Will. In northwest Indiana, Benton, Jasper and Newton. * WHEN...Until 3 AM CDT Monday. * IMPACTS...Creeks and streams may rise out of their banks. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Slow moving thunderstorms capable of producing hourly rainfall rates locally greater than 2 inches per hour. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: A Flood Watch means flooding is possible, but not yet certain, based upon the latest forecasts. Persons with interests along area rivers, creeks, and other waterways should monitor the latest forecasts and be prepared to take action should flooding develop.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Will; Ford; Grundy; Iroquois; Kankakee; La Salle; Livingston; Southern Will
